name: Home Invasion
description:
After a long day at work you come home, hoping to get that well deserved rest, only to find out that rats are taking over your house. Because it's too late to call the exterminator you have to do the job yourself, with what you can find around you.

Kill as many as you can! Beware, they like to multiply and to come in waves!

Good Luck!!!

NEW RELEASE - v1.0.0d

- Fixed spawn timer bug

- Modified Controls (Grab and Hold item with RMB and throw with LMB)

- Replaced models (See updated screenshots)

- Replaced and added sounds

- Small quests added

- Pause menu with settings for Audio and Graphics Quality
